text: this is my serious thinker look
hey there go travelers so i am back to
planning my responsible
adventure group tours again this time
it's gotta work now the first group trip
that i planned based on your requests
was to thailand and it didn't quite work
out but thankfully it didn't because
then the pandemic hit
the second time second time i tried this
group tour thing to india i was about to
hit that launch button and then the
delta hit
now the third time has got to be the
charm and i have some fun ideas that i'd
love to play with to bring you all along
now i know that i've asked you for help
in the past and your input in shaping
these group tours and due to the fact
that your interests may have changed i
am going to ask you to fill out that
form again to help me shape my upcoming
group tours yes i am your input is super
important i need at least 100 of you to
share your interests so that i can get
something down on paper
the goal of my group tours is
sustainable responsible adventures
any profits i make will go to help grow
traveler recover and so that i can
return to my solo travel filming work
that i do at grow traveler now link is
in the description box or in the bio i
would love to travel with you and for
you to sample what a typical adventure
with me would be like
so don't think
just hit reply
